txt.en: 'I have made an unsettling discovery: Wargs in Thinglad! This has not happened for many a long year. The Old Burrows are now overrun with them.\n\n'Evil is certainly spreading over the lands in these dark days, but I believe we can prevail, my friend. Will you go slay as many of the dire beasts as you can?'
'So you have defeated a number of those awful beasts? Thank you, [placeholder]. I speak for the sentinels of Thinglad when I say that your deeds are greatly appreciated here.'
'I spotted the Wargs in the Old Burrow, settling into the long-abandoned animal dens there.'
Renfaer has made a discovery of Wargs in a once-abandoned part of Thinglad.
Defeated Wargs at the Old Burrow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Wargs at the Old Burrow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Wargs are along the south-western edge of Thinglad in the Old Burrows.\n\nYou should slay many Wargs in the Old Burrows.
Renfaer can be found near the centre of the woods of Thinglad.\n\nYou should speak with Renfaer.
